title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Bedroom Furniture", 1934–35
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper left: drawer/& cup b.; at upper center: on drawer space/like; at center: drawers/cupb./hats./shoe racks; at center left: desk/drawers./cup b.
description: Series of perspective and plan drawings for a bedroom on the Lady Esther Yacht. Drawing at upper left of a rectilinear drawer and cupboard with diagonal structure above (lighting?). At right is drawing for doorway or closet, flanked by a set of drawers and cupboard at left, and a compartment for hat and shoe rack at right. Above is detailed drawing of the spacing of drawers. At right is floor plan for bedroom, followed below by a perspective drawing of furniture. At lower center is wall elevation of two sets of cabinets at left, a desk and chair at right. Above the furniture is either three works of art, or windows. At lower left is a rendering of window units, and to the far, lower left is a perspective drawing of a desk, drawers, and cupboard.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Bedroom Furniture", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-312-2.
